mapper.select: SELECT m.LOG_DATE, m.PROJECT_ID, m.PROJECT_NAME, m.CREATEBY AS USER_ID, m.TIME_START AS DURATION, m.GROUP_ID as DEPARTMENT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( l.LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m' ) LOG_DATE, l.PROJECT_ID PROJECT_ID, l.PROJECT_NAME PROJECT_NAME, l.CREATEBY CREATEBY, ROUND( SUM( l.TIME_START ), 2 ) TIME_START, l.GROUP_ID GROUP_ID FROM logmanagement l GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( l.LOG_DATE, '%Y-%m' ), l.PROJECT_ID, l.CREATEBY, l.PROJECT_NAME, l.GROUP_ID ) m WHERE m.LOG_DATE = #{years}
